channel.title: Skill capes weilding in weapon slot!
channel.description:
Ok, I've made my client and server but the skill capes are weilding in the weapon slot, I've added the item codes to Item.java under:
[code] public static int capes[] = { [/code]
Although it's made no difference, help?
-Gaz

item.title: Skill capes weilding in weapon slot!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

And if you plan to add hoods, add them into (HATS) and (FULL HELMS) to rid of the glitches that come with hoods. If you need more help with items, drops, bonuses, or anything else pm me.

Read full topic
item.source: Skill capes weilding in weapon slot!

item.title: Skill capes weilding in weapon slot!

@rangeangel wrote:

just put all your skilcapes ids in capes… in your item4

item.description:
@jacobhankal wrote:

search the code and make sure it isnt in like helms hats or anything else but capes i had the same problem with prayer cape and the problem was that i had it posted into more than one of those
